p: The diverse bioactivities of T. mastichina essential oil and extracts are related to the chemical composition. Essential oil and extracts from the aerial parts of T. mastichina have been mainly described for their antibacterial and antifungal activities, but also for antioxidant, anticancer, antiviral, insecticidal, insect repellent, and anti-enzymatic activities (anti-Alzheimer, anti-inflammatory, α-amylase, and α-glucosidase).
